v.v: Tell Yahweh that you thank him very much for the good things that he has done for you!
You Israelite people should repeatedly shout,
You priests who are descendants of Aaron should repeatedly shout,
All you who revere him should repeatedly shout,
When I was distressed, I called out to Yahweh,
Yahweh is on my side,
Yes, Yahweh is on my side,
It is better to trust in Yahweh
It is better to trust Yahweh to protect us
Armies of many nations surrounded us,
They completely surrounded us,
They swarmed around me like angry bees;
Our enemies attacked us fiercely and almost defeated us,
Yahweh is the one who makes me strong,
Listen to the joyful songs of victory being sung in the tents of the people who honor God!
he has raised his strong right arm to show he is happy over defeating his enemies.
I will not be killed in battle;
Yahweh has punished me severely,
You gatekeepers, open for me the gates of the temple
Those are the gates through which we enter the temple to worship Yahweh;
Yahweh, I thank you that you answered my prayer
Yahweh’s chosen king is like a stone that the builders rejected
This was done by Yahweh,
This is the day on which we remember that Yahweh acted powerfully to defeat our enemies;
Yahweh, we plead with you to keep rescuing us from our enemies.
Yahweh, bless the one who will come with your power.
Yahweh is God,
Yahweh, you are the God whom I worship, and I will praise you!
Thank Yahweh because he does good things for us!

v: He faithfully loves us, his people, forever.
“He faithfully loves us, his people, forever!”
“He faithfully loves us, his people, forever!”
“He faithfully loves us, his people, forever!”
and he answered me and set me free from my worries.
so I will not be afraid of anything.
No one can do anything that will prevent God from blessing me forever.
so I will look triumphantly at my enemies while he defeats them.
than to depend on people.
than to trust that influential people will protect us.
but Yahweh enabled us to defeat them by his power.
but we defeated them all by Yahweh’s power.
they were like a fire that flares up in a thornbush,
but we defeated them by Yahweh’s power.
but Yahweh helped us.
and he is the one about whom I always sing;
he has saved us from my enemies.
They sing, “Yahweh has defeated our enemies by his mighty power;
Yahweh has completely defeated them!”
I will live to proclaim the great things that Yahweh has done.
but he has not allowed me to die.
so that I may enter and thank Yahweh.
those who honor God enter through those gates.
and that you saved me from my enemies.
when they were building a house,
but that stone became the cornerstone.
and it is a wonderful thing for us to see.
we will rejoice and be glad today.
Yahweh, please help us accomplish what we want to do.
From the temple we bless all of you.
and he has caused his light to come to us.
Come, bring animal sacrifice and tie it to the horns of the altar.
You are my God, and I will tell everyone that you are great!
He will faithfully love us forever as he has promised.
